summary: "TAKATA RECALL." I AM BEING TOLD BY THE AUTO AIRBAG SETTLEMENT NOTICE ADMINISTRATOR THAT MY 2007 TOYOTA COROLLA VEHICLE IS ON THE "PRIORITY 1 GROUP" CONCERNING THE TAKATA AIRBAG CLASS ACTION SUIT, BUT THE NHTSA SAFECAR.GOV INFORMATION NOTES A 0 (ZERO) RECALL. THERE SEEMS TO BE A CONTRADICTION BETWEEN THE TWO SOURCES. WHAT SHOULD BE MY NEXT STEP?
